analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x35d76c3db8e826907d2a977500b54b3914ecc020.sol#109-113) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x35d76c3db8e826907d2a977500b54b3914ecc020.sol#112-113)

EladCrowdsale.allocateRemainingTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x35d76c3db8e826907d2a977500b54b3914ecc020.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,remaining) (/unique_chucks/18/0x35d76c3db8e826907d2a977500b54b3914ecc020.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0x35d76c3db8e826907d2a977500b54b3914ecc020.sol:
